articles.author: Conor Murray
articles.title: ‘Captain America: Brave New World’ Is One Of Marvel’s Worst-Reviewed Films - Forbes
articles.description: “Captain America: Brave New World” was already hampered by multiple controversies ahead of its Feb. 14 release.
articles.content: The Marvel Cinematic Universes latest installment, Captain America: Brave New World, opens Friday fresh off the heels of some of the superhero franchises worst-ever reviews as well as several controv… [+6451 chars]
